channel.title: Client background help
channel.description: Hey guys, so when my client runs for the first time on a computer, it downloads the cache (obviously). I changed the background.png in my cache folder, and the sprites folder inside my cache folder. I used tom's cache suite to change the title.dat and repacked the cache. The only problem is when the cache is downloading, it still uses the old background, until its completely downloaded, then it'll change to my custom one. any ideas on what else I'd have to change?

item.title: Client background help
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

Hey guys, so when my client runs for the first time on a computer, it downloads the cache (obviously). I changed the background.png in my cache folder, and the sprites folder inside my cache folder. I used tom’s cache suite to change the title.dat and repacked the cache. The only problem is when the cache is downloading, it still uses the old background, until its completely downloaded, then it’ll change to my custom one. any ideas on what else I’d have to change?

Read full topic
